# Stolen Breath (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] \[[[Air Spells|air]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, F (a stoppered glass vial)

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Target:** One living creature that breathes air

**Duration:** Instantaneous; see text

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 207

*With a clenched fist, you make a tugging motion toward your target. A transparent, barely perceptible hand appears to plunge into your target’s mouth.*

With this spell, you steal all the air from the subject’s lungs, causing it to suffer a momentary respiratory crisis. It can take shallow breaths and act normally but is considered [[Sickened|sickened]] for 1 minute. At any time during this minute, the subject can take a full-round action to get its wind back, ending the condition.
